title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Science-Based Simulations for Emergency Remote Teaching (ERT)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in science and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can perform science experiment scenarios with over 80% accuracy using simulation/VR tools in an ERT (Emergency Remote Teaching) environment.
Learners successfully complete project-based tasks with team members three or more times via non-face-to-face collaboration platforms.
Learners can identify five or more psychological/technical issues arising during emergency remote education and propose response strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
